bt.net

Interface PeerActivityListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultTorrentSession

    public interface PeerActivityListener
    Listens for substantial peer events, like initial discovery, establishing the connection and dropping the connection.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPeerConnected(TorrentId torrentId, Peer peer)
      Invoked when a new peer is connected and the handshake, containing the torrent ID, is processed.
      void onPeerDisconnected(Peer peer)
      Invoked when a peer connection is dropped.
      void onPeerDiscovered(Peer peer)
      Invoked when a new peer is discovered.

    • Method Detail

      • onPeerDiscovered

        void onPeerDiscovered(Peer peer)
        Invoked when a new peer is discovered.
        Parameters:
        peer - Remote peer
        Since:
        1.0

      • onPeerConnected

        void onPeerConnected(TorrentId torrentId,
                     Peer peer)
        Invoked when a new peer is connected and the handshake, containing the torrent ID, is processed.
        Parameters:
        torrentId - ID of a torrent, that this peer is interested in sharing or downloading
        peer - Remote peer
        Since:
        1.0

      • onPeerDisconnected

        void onPeerDisconnected(Peer peer)
        Invoked when a peer connection is dropped.
        Parameters:
        peer - Remote peer
